attributes.title: Absolutely the worst thing you could download
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app to support our president I was very disappointed with the service, and almost immediately after I used it I got hacked by Russia or some country I don’t know but I would not recommend anybody download unless you want to get hacked.

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: Thiis app gave me so many viruses and I was hopping it wouldn’t take long to download but it’s been over a week know and it just downloaded and I was hoping it would be as good as it says in the description but it just isn’t good it’z given me viruses and has slowed down my phone made my phone freeze it’s not worth it

attributes.title: If I could give it -1 stars I would
attributes.review: I came here to support the presidick of the United States. I was unable to do so because app didn’t even download, since my phone recognized the blatant racist policies of our POTASS. Bless Apple and Siri for looking out for me. I’ve read the other reviews and I definitely wouldn’t want what happened to them.

attributes.title: This app is a waste of ✨t i m e✨
attributes.review: It's dumb and takes 365 days for it to download. It messed with everything in my house and my tv started sing the Dora theme song I kid u not. But to all the Trump supporters go ahead and have ur info stolen because of this app. Wait the 365 days and see what happens. Don't say we didn't tell u 💖✨have a horrible day Trump supporters✨💖

attributes.title: ONE STAR
attributes.review: This is by far the worst problem I’ve ever had downloading an app. This app brought so many viruses onto my phone and now I have to get an entirely new phone. Too bad I was just trying to get some more information on Donald Trump. Looks like I’ll be looking into other candidates this year and NEVER downloading this app again.

attributes.title: The Worst App                                #savetiktok
attributes.review: I thought it was going to be at least somewhat good but my expectations went down and when I open the app it was so slow it took 30 minutes to load and then my phone kept on crashing so much and it has been the worst app I have ever seen!

attributes.title: DISGUSTING HORRIFIC TERRIBLE TERRIFYING DISASTROUS
attributes.review: To ALL my fellow hot Cheeto Cult members... this was honestly the ✨WORST ✨app ever. I downloaded it and it took FOREVER!!!&$;&;‘so my phone was gotten so many viruses 🦠 and sometimes my phone glitches. One time I checked my home screen and there was the MOST NASTY HOT CHEETO IVE EVER SEEN!!! Literally it was orange and it looked nasty AF!! 🤢 I have so much trauma now idk who toe coal in it!! So guys just don’t get it it was such a terrible experience 😔

attributes.title: PLEASE READ‼️ do NOT download
attributes.review: i downloaded📱this app and IMMEDIATELY deleted it🙅‍♀️. i didn’t even want to OPEN📬 the app after it downloaded because i was TERRIFIED😱👻of being cursed😨🔮🦧 i only downloaded because of a truth or DARE😵 game👀 and let me just say i have never been so sick to my stomach🤢because of the pure FEAR👺of even typing 📲⌨️the app in the search🕵️‍♀️ bar... REFRAIN FROM DOWNLOADING!! DO NOT RISK IT!!!❌‼️

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: This app got my phone hacked!! I can’t believe it I was walking down the street going to my local taqueria and as I am ordering my tacos I get a huge pop up on my phone saying “TROMPAS PA PRESIDENT” I cried I couldn’t even finish my order . Had to smash my phone and get a new one. 0/10 highly do not recommended. Lost my vision and my green card.

attributes.title: Wouldn’t Recommend
attributes.review: Downloaded very very slow and once i finally got to open the app, the app itself was extremely slow and took too long loading. and even when it loaded, i had multiple issues making an account. very janky app. deleting.
